mapper.select: SELECT h.horse_id, h.club_id, c.club_name, h.horse_name, h.horse_code, h.breed, h.gender, h.color, h.height, h.weight, h.birth_date, h.chip_no, h.passport_no, h.pedigree_cert_url, h.horse_type, h.owner_id, member.actual_name as owner_name, h.responsible_coach_id, coach.actual_name as responsible_coach_name, h.responsible_groom_id, groom.actual_name as responsible_groom_name, h.boarding_start_date, h.boarding_end_date, h.boarding_fee, h.health_status, h.work_status, h.horse_data, h.create_time, h.create_by, h.update_time, h.update_by FROM m_horse h LEFT JOIN m_club c ON h.club_id = c.club_id AND c.is_delete = 0 AND c.is_valid = 1 LEFT JOIN m_member member ON h.owner_id = member.member_id AND member.is_delete = 0 AND member.is_valid = 1 LEFT JOIN m_coach coach ON h.responsible_coach_id = coach.coach_id AND coach.is_delete = 0 AND coach.is_valid = 1 LEFT JOIN t_employee groom ON h.responsible_groom_id = groom.employee_id AND groom.deleted_flag = 0 WHERE h.horse_id = #{horseId} AND h.is_delete = 0 AND h.is_valid = 1
SELECT * FROM m_horse WHERE horse_code = #{horseCode} AND club_id = #{clubId} AND is_delete = 0 AND is_valid = 1
SELECT * FROM m_horse WHERE chip_no = #{chipNo} AND is_delete = 0 AND is_valid = 1
SELECT * FROM m_horse WHERE horse_code = #{horseCode} AND club_id = #{clubId} AND horse_id != #{excludeHorseId} AND is_delete = 0 AND is_valid = 1
SELECT * FROM m_horse WHERE chip_no = #{chipNo} AND horse_id != #{excludeHorseId} AND is_delete = 0 AND is_valid = 1
